channel.title: Where Is Runescape Cheating These Days?
channel.description:
Hey moparisthebest,
I used to be involved in runescape cheating from way back in the day. I was a part of rs-resources.com under this same name. I was really young, and definitely stupid. I used to write kiddy scripts for Aryan and SCAR. Nowadays, I am studying to become an electrical engineer in second year university. I've taken a bunch of courses on programming and I think I'm a little more adept at programming. I want to just get up some practice writing code for RS cheating because I remember that was pretty fun. I need some direction as to where I should look. Where is runescape cheating these days? Is there anything like Aryan anymore where I can code in JAVA? Is SCAR my best option? I have minimal knowledge of runescape in general and played a good 3-5 years ago now.
Anyways, throw me a bone so I can start coding.
Thanks,
Derek

item.title: Where Is Runescape Cheating These Days?
item.dc:creator: @Iamadam Iamadam
item.description:
@Iamadam wrote:

[mopar]villavu.com.
Simba works great - I’ve had 10hour pure color progress reports. Color can solve 95% of randoms now too.
And if that wasn’t enough, it can also use reflection to grab client data.
Also, there’s a bot called cherokee being worked on[/mopar]

Read full topic
item.source: Where Is Runescape Cheating These Days?

item.title: Where Is Runescape Cheating These Days?

item.description:
@z wrote:

The best way to get involved with the cheating community now is to not get involved with the cheating community since, as stated above, it has become greedy and/or infested with theft of worthlessness.

Read full topic

item.description:
@MrHams wrote:

Reeheeheeally?

There must be some sort of legitimate way I can code and make my little runescape characters do whatever I want?

item.title: Where Is Runescape Cheating These Days?
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Any scene involving ruler isn’t a good one, though that might just be a conspiracy.

RS Cheating consits of two things now. First, 20$ Scripts and Second, Scripts that work but steal your password.

Also, inb4 mopar tries to sell you the deal with simba or cherokee, as they don’t seem to be going anywhere fast.

Read full topic
item.source: Where Is Runescape Cheating These Days?

@MrHams wrote:

Sick man. Can I get some context of the current scene? What about ruler/ibot/nexus/rscheata.net

EDIT: Apparently powerbot.org is in some sort of scandal?

Read full topic
